docs.lead_paragraph: 9:28 a.m. | Updated There is a follow-up to this post.

headline.main: Trial and Error with AdWords and S.E.O.

docs.abstract: Eventually, Catherine Wood Hill chose to lose the P.R. specialist, ditch the e-mail list vendors, and skip AdWords all together.

docs.lead_paragraph: Someone could make a funny mash-up video for YouTube of all the times Tami Taylor has a glass of white wine in front of her when she is in her living room. Never rosé? Never a Stella Artois? Apparently not. But given the crisis that has broken out over her informal counseling sessions with Becky on "Friday Night Lights," she has every reason to want to take the edge off, however uncreatively she may choose.

headline.main: 'Friday Night Lights' Watch: Private Meets Public

docs.abstract: The writers explore how the subject of Becky's abortion moves into the public sphere, in a place where religious convictions run deep.
docs.snippet: The writers explore how the subject of Becky's abortion moves into the public sphere, in a place where religious convictions run deep.

docs.lead_paragraph: Superintendent Tony Smith of the Oakland schools has a five-year plan to turn the system around, and it’s based on his success in the nearby Emeryville district.

headline.main: Oakland Schools Struggle, but Emeryville May Point a Way Up
headline.print_headline: Oakland Schools Struggle, but Emeryville May Point a Way Up

docs.snippet: Superintendent Tony Smith of the Oakland schools has a five-year plan to turn the system around, and it’s based on his success in the nearby Emeryville district.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Department of Housing and Urban Development said today that it wouldtake complaints from individuals who believe they have been harmed by the practices of certain lenders who may have illegally denied mortgages because applicants were pregnant or on short-term disability.

headline.main: HUD Accepting Complaints About Mortgage Lenders

docs.abstract: The Department of Housing and Urban Development will investigate the practices of certain lenders to make sure borrowers haven't been illegally denied a mortgage because of a pregnancy or short-term disability.
docs.snippet: The Department of Housing and Urban Development will investigate the practices of certain lenders to make sure borrowers haven't been illegally denied a mortgage because of a pregnancy or short-term disability.

docs.lead_paragraph: The agency will look into refusals by some lenders to make home loans to people who were pregnant or on short-term disability.

headline.main: HUD to Investigate Mortgage Loan Denials
headline.print_headline: HUD to Investigate Mortgage Loan Denials

docs.snippet: The agency will look into refusals by some lenders to make home loans to people who were pregnant or on short-term disability.

docs.lead_paragraph: Small businesses generally have discretion in whether to offer leave after the birth or adoption of a child, but a flexible approach often pays dividends.
